instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00163: What is 820-00163? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00163</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no speakers
threads.message:
Hi guys I have this liquid damaged machine, went in a pond. Ultrasoniced it, replaced some IC and display and all working fine except the audio port. It shows the red light and digital out, no speakers detected. Already tried to clean with alcohol, but it was already in the ultrasonic so that didnt do the trick. WHat should i check first?

Addon: I found also that HDMI gives a purple display, i can see everything but purple. The output from the Thunderbold ports & display is fine, so seems no GPU issue. If any idea pls let me know. I already tried to replace the IO board + cable. Same with a new one.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00163</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no speakers
threads.message:
Check all small coils and zener protections for audio connector; and traces too.

For HDMI you can have broken trace, or knocked off component...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00163</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no speakers
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00163</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no speakers
threads.message:
Please let a feedback about your solution.
This can help another members in the future...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00163</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no speakers
threads.message: We resoldered the joints from J6600 there appeared to be some cracks. Somehow this also fixed the purple colour of HDMI as that worked also after we did this :). Happy customer!

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00163</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no speakers
threads.message: After successfuly repair, the technician should be more happier than the client :)

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00163</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no speakers
threads.message: Im happy too indeed, this repair made up for another year of forum support :)
